text: Been there several times over the years.  VERY VERY vegetarian friendly.  Love the BMZ sandwich!  Very relaxed.  Great outdoor seating.  will go again!

Ah le Kilo ! Le second violon par excellence. Tu ne prend jamais un dessert ni un café quand tu vas dans le village : Tu vas au KILO ! Premièrement, le service est magique. Tu es a peine assise et tu reçois un grand verre d'eau avec glace. (rien de mieux qu'un serveur qui devine qu'après une bouteille de vin et une marche, tout ce que tu souhaite c'est de l'eau. Magique je dis !). Une petite tisane/thé/café et une tranche de gâteau maison font ma joie.

Ils ont une belle terrasse donnant sur la rue piétonnière.

Just a note about this restaurant.  I reviewed the restaurant back in 2011 and said in that review (and in a note to Yelp) that the restaurant had been renamed to 1000 Grammes.  It is still in the same spot and hopefully will remain for years to come.

Good paninis, decent drinks.  Must come back for one of their phenomenal looking desserts.  Great prices!

Apparently this is a perfect place to come as a student with laptop etc... they are friendly and let you sit
Un classique avec ses nombreux desserts. À l'occasion, j'aime bien terminer un repas à cet endroit.
Pretty good food and very good sangria! Didn't try the desserts but I heard it's their specialty.

It's a Café with a menu and waiting service. Quite cheap, with great selection of dessert. Like classic Café in France, your coffee comes with a sucker. I like that place. It's in the Village Gai of Montreal, so it's mainly a place I like to go when I got out near the Village Gay.  It's friendly and nice.

Kilo c'est une place on s'y sent bienvenue. Peu dispendieux, belle listes de déssert, ils ont aussi un menu typiquement café : Paninis et autres trucs du même genre.

What I loved about this place was the warm welcome from the staff and the cozy, laid-back atmosphere.  We changed tables and stuck around for a while, never feeling like we were inconveniencing the staff.

The food was a bit dull and their coffee was standard. I got a simple croissant sandwich and it was mostly tasteless and wilted.
